name: 3. Key Features and Components
content:
Data Ingestion:

Reads raw data from a CSV file, including product prices, performance indices, sales volumes, and marketing spend.


Data Preparation:

Cleans and prepares data for modeling.


Engineers features relevant to pricing and sales predictions.

Computes correlations between price and volume.


Model Building:

  • Supports multiple machine learning methods (e.g., Random Forest, Decision Tree).
  • Allows feature selection and configuration of modeling parameters.
  • Evaluates models based on specified loss metrics.
  • Enables validation based on configurable time periods (e.g., number of weeks).


Prediction:

  • Uses the best model to predict weekly sales volumes.
  • Provides business users with data-driven pricing recommendations.
